name: The Turreteer
description:
Small war game prototype, you are controlling turret cannon & machine gun and just shooting anything that moves!

Controls:
- Left mouse button = shoot
- Right mouse button = zoom
- Middle mouse button = swap between cannon/machine gun
- ESC = Quit

Note: Cannon overheats if shot too many times.

website:
http://games.unitycoder.com/TheTurreteer/
